title: Calories in Toast with Avocado
meta_description: Learn calories in toast with avocado for one serving, plus protein, fats, carbs, full nutrition facts, and easy tweaks to customize.
assumptions: 1 slice whole wheat bread (~28g), toasted; 1/2 medium Hass avocado (~68g), mashed or sliced; no added salt, oil, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, avocado ripeness, portion size, and additions like seasonings or spreads. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of toast with avocado provides ~183 kcal, rich in healthy fats and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use full medium avocado instead of half
Add one poached egg on top

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of avocado toast?
faqs.a: About 183 kcal for 1 slice whole wheat toast with half an avocado.

faqs.q: Is avocado toast high in healthy fats?
faqs.a: Yes, ~11.5 g total fat per serving, mostly monounsaturated from the avocado.

faqs.q: How much fiber in toast with avocado?
faqs.a: Around 6.6 g per serving, mainly from the avocado and whole wheat bread.
Modest amount: ~3.4 g per serving; add eggs or seeds to boost it.

faqs.q: Can I make avocado toast lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, use thinner bread or less avocado; skip butter or oil to reduce by 30-50 kcal.
